doc.field:
Chapter titles and page numbers:
01 | Intrigued, 1 02 | First Call to Arms, 8 03 | The Vagaries of Men and Nature, 26 04 | Quarantined, 50 05 | The Will of the People, 54 06 | Camp at Van Courtlandt, 71 07 | Scattered to the Four Winds, 76 08 | The Engineers, 84 09 | A Messenger in the Night, 98 10 | Off on the Great Adventure, 117 11 | An Exciting Voyage, 127 12 | In Northern France, 146 13 | A Grueling March, 162 14 | On to Mount Kemmel, 214 15 | Nights of Hell at Mount Scherpenberg, 269 16 | A Strange Rest, 352 17 | The Great Battle of the Hindenberg Line, 394 18 | The Canadian Hospital at Trouville, 437 19 | The Battle of La Salle River and Jonc de Mer Ridge, 445 20 | I Meet Michael [changed to "Gervaise"], 453 21 | The Armistice, 460 22 | A Colonel Goes Berserk, 484 23 | A Wild Voyage, 493 24 | Farewell to Arms, 499
